title: Ajax youth coaching staff complete for the new season
snippet: Technical Management: Joost van Dam (Head of Foundation Phase) Stef Wijlaars (Head of Youth Development Phase/Professional Development Phase) Fred Grim (Head of Coaching) Marijn Beuker has been the Director of Football at Ajax since December 1, 2023, where he is responsible for the entire substantial football process from the U8 team to Ajax 1.

title: AFC Ajax - Wikipedia
snippet: They hired Francesco Farioli as new head coach, the first foreign coach since 1998. Under his leadership, Ajax reached the league phase of the Europa League, where it finished eleventh.
